verses.text: Now \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w* the \w Gileadite|strong="H1569"\w* was a mighty \w man|strong="H1368"\w* of \w valour|strong="H2428"\w*, and he \add was\add* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of an \w harlot|strong="H0802"\w*: and \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w*.\f + \fr 11.1 \ft Jephthah: Gr. Jephthae\f*\f + \fr 11.1 \ft an harlot: Heb. a woman an harlot\f*

And \w Gilead’s|strong="H1568"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* him \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*; and his \w wife’s|strong="H0802"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* grew \w up|strong="H1431"\w*, and they thrust \w out|strong="H1644"\w* \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Thou shalt not \w inherit|strong="H5157"\w* in our \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; for thou \add art\add* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of a \w strange|strong="H0312"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*.

Then \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w* \w fled|strong="H1272"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, and \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Tob|strong="H2897"\w*: and there were \w gathered|strong="H3950"\w* \w vain|strong="H7386"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* to \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w*, and went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* with him.\f + \fr 11.3 \ft from: Heb. from the face of\f*

¶ And it came to pass in process of \w time|strong="H3117"\w*, that the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w* made \w war|strong="H3898"\w* against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 11.4 \ft in process…: Heb. after days\f*

And it was so, that when the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w* made \w war|strong="H3898"\w* against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w fetch|strong="H3947"\w* \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Tob|strong="H2897"\w*:

And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w*, \w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, and be our \w captain|strong="H7101"\w*, that we may \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* with the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*.

And \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, Did not ye \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* me, and \w expel|strong="H1644"\w* me out of my \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*? and why are ye \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto me now when ye are in \w distress|strong="H6887"\w*?

And the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w*, Therefore we turn \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to thee now, that thou mayest \w go|strong="H1980"\w* with us, and \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, and be our \w head|strong="H7218"\w* over all the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*.

And \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, If ye bring me home \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* them \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me, shall I be your \w head|strong="H7218"\w*?

And the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* be \w witness|strong="H8085"\w* between us, if we \w do|strong="H6213"\w* not so according to thy \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.\f + \fr 11.10 \ft witness…: Heb. the hearer between us\f*

Then \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* with the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w made|strong="H7760"\w* him \w head|strong="H7218"\w* and \w captain|strong="H7101"\w* over them: and \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w* \w uttered|strong="H1696"\w* all his \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in \w Mizpeh|strong="H4709"\w*.

¶ And \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, What hast thou to do with me, that thou art \w come|strong="H0935"\w* against me to \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* in my \w land|strong="H0776"\w*?

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* of \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w*, Because \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* took \w away|strong="H3947"\w* my \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, when they came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, from \w Arnon|strong="H0769"\w* even unto \w Jabbok|strong="H2999"\w*, and unto \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*: now therefore restore those \add lands\add* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w peaceably|strong="H7965"\w*.

And \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w again|strong="H3254"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*:

And \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w*, \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* took not \w away|strong="H3947"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, nor the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*:

But when \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* through the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* unto the \w Red|strong="H5488"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Kadesh|strong="H6946"\w*;

Then \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Let me, I pray thee, pass \w through|strong="H5674"\w* thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: but the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* would not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* \add thereto\add*. And in like manner they \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*: but he \w would|strong="H0014"\w* not \add consent:\add* and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w abode|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Kadesh|strong="H6946"\w*.

Then they went \w along|strong="H3212"\w* through the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, and \w compassed|strong="H5437"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*, and the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* by the east \w side|strong="H4217"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, and \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* on the other \w side|strong="H5676"\w* of \w Arnon|strong="H0769"\w*, but \w came|strong="H0935"\w* not within the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*: for \w Arnon|strong="H0769"\w* \add was\add* the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*.

And \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* unto \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w*; and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Let us \w pass|strong="H5674"\w*, we pray thee, through thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w into|strong="H5704"\w* my \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

But \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* \w trusted|strong="H0539"\w* not \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* through his \w coast|strong="H1366"\w*: but \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* all his \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w together|strong="H0622"\w*, and \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* in \w Jahaz|strong="H3096"\w*, and \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* and all his \w people|strong="H5971"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and they \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* them: so \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w possessed|strong="H3423"\w* all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of that \w country|strong="H0776"\w*.

And they \w possessed|strong="H3423"\w* all the \w coasts|strong="H1366"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, from \w Arnon|strong="H0769"\w* even unto \w Jabbok|strong="H2999"\w*, and from the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* even unto \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*.

So now the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* hath \w dispossessed|strong="H3423"\w* the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and shouldest thou \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it?

Wilt not thou \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* that which \w Chemosh|strong="H3645"\w* thy \w god|strong="H0430"\w* giveth thee to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w*? So whomsoever the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall drive \w out|strong="H3423"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* us, them will we \w possess|strong="H3423"\w*.

And now \add art\add* thou any thing \w better|strong="H2896"\w* than \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zippor|strong="H6834"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*? did he \w ever|strong="H7378"\w* \w strive|strong="H7378"\w* against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, or did he \w ever|strong="H3898"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against them,

While \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w* and her \w towns|strong="H1323"\w*, and in \w Aroer|strong="H6177"\w* and her \w towns|strong="H1323"\w*, and in all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* that \add be\add* along by the \w coasts|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Arnon|strong="H0769"\w*, \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*? why therefore did ye not \w recover|strong="H5337"\w* \add them\add* within that \w time|strong="H6256"\w*?

Wherefore I have not \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against thee, but thou \w doest|strong="H6213"\w* me \w wrong|strong="H7451"\w* to \w war|strong="H3898"\w* against me: the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* the \w Judge|strong="H8199"\w* be \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* between the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*.

Howbeit the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w* \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* not unto the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w* which he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* him.

¶ Then the \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came upon \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w*, and he passed \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, and \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, and passed \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w Mizpeh|strong="H4708"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, and from \w Mizpeh|strong="H4708"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* he passed \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \add unto\add* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*.

And \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w* \w vowed|strong="H5087"\w* a \w vow|strong="H5088"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, If thou shalt without \w fail|strong="H5414"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w* into mine \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*,

Then it shall be, that \w whatsoever|strong="H3318"\w* cometh \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* of my \w house|strong="H1004"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* me, when I \w return|strong="H7725"\w* in \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* from the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, shall surely be the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and I will offer it \w up|strong="H5927"\w* for a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*.\f + \fr 11.31 \ft whatsoever…: Heb. that which cometh forth, which shall come forth\f*\f + \fr 11.31 \ft and…: or, or I will offer it, etc\f*

¶ So \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w* passed \w over|strong="H5674"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w* to \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against them; and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* them into his \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

And he \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* them from \w Aroer|strong="H6177"\w*, even till thou \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Minnith|strong="H4511"\w*, \add even\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, and unto the \w plain|strong="H0058"\w* of the \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*, with a \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H4347"\w*. Thus the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w* were \w subdued|strong="H3665"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 11.33 \ft the plain: or, Abel\f*

¶ And \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Mizpeh|strong="H4709"\w* unto his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and, behold, his \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* came \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* him with \w timbrels|strong="H8596"\w* and with \w dances|strong="H4246"\w*: and she \add was his\add* only \w child|strong="H3173"\w*; beside her he had neither \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w nor|strong="H0176"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*.\f + \fr 11.34 \ft beside…: or, he had not of his own either son or daughter: Heb. of himself\f*

And it came to pass, when he \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* her, that he \w rent|strong="H7167"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Alas|strong="H0162"\w*, my \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*! thou hast \w brought|strong="H3766"\w* me \w very|strong="H3766"\w* \w low|strong="H3766"\w*, and thou art one of them that \w trouble|strong="H5916"\w* me: for I have \w opened|strong="H6475"\w* my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and I \w cannot|strong="H3201"\w* go \w back|strong="H7725"\w*.

And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, My \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \add if\add* thou hast \w opened|strong="H6475"\w* thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w do|strong="H6213"\w* to me according to that \w which|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w proceeded|strong="H3318"\w* out of thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*; \w forasmuch|strong="H0310"\w* as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w taken|strong="H6213"\w* \w vengeance|strong="H5360"\w* for thee of thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, \add even\add* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*.

And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, Let this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* be \w done|strong="H6213"\w* for me: let me \w alone|strong="H7503"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w months|strong="H2320"\w*, that I may go \w up|strong="H3212"\w* and \w down|strong="H3381"\w* upon the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, and \w bewail|strong="H1058"\w* my \w virginity|strong="H1331"\w*, I and my \w fellows|strong="H7464"\w*.\f + \fr 11.37 \ft go up…: Heb. go and go down\f*

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*. And he sent her \w away|strong="H7971"\w* \add for\add* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w months|strong="H2320"\w*: and she \w went|strong="H3212"\w* with her \w companions|strong="H7464"\w*, and \w bewailed|strong="H1058"\w* her \w virginity|strong="H1331"\w* upon the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*.

And it came to pass at the \w end|strong="H7093"\w* of \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w months|strong="H2320"\w*, that she \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* unto her \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, who \w did|strong="H6213"\w* with her \add according\add* to his \w vow|strong="H5088"\w* which he had \w vowed|strong="H5087"\w*: and she \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* no \w man|strong="H0376"\w*. And it was a \w custom|strong="H2706"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*,\f + \fr 11.39 \ft custom: or, ordinance\f*

\add That\add* the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w yearly|strong="H3117"\w* to \w lament|strong="H8567"\w* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w* the \w Gileadite|strong="H1569"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* in a \w year|strong="H8141"\w*.\f + \fr 11.40 \ft yearly: Heb. from year to year\f*\f + \fr 11.40 \ft to lament: or, to talk with\f*
